t = int(raw_input())
from itertools import combinations
for _ in xrange(t):
    scores = map(int, raw_input().split())
    k = int(raw_input())
    mn = -1
    mc = 0
    for c in combinations(scores, k):
        s = sum(c)
        if s > mn:
            mn = s
            mc = 1
        elif s == mn:
            mc += 1
    print mc
